name: 14.0 CIVIL SPECIFICATION - TRENCHING, BEDDING, AND BACKFILLING
14.01 - Trenching
DRAWING / SPECIFICATION REF.: T+T NAL Recovery Specifications: 10.2.5.1.1
SPECIFICATION DETAIL SUMMARY: Trench excavation to be carried out in accordance with KiwiRail Civil Engineering Standard Culverts C-ST-CD-4103 Section 7.1.2.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Excavation in line with KiwiRail Civil Engineering Standard Culverts C-ST-CD- 4103 Section 7.1.2..
TEST SPEC AND FREQUENCY: For every section of trench
CONTROL TYPE I.E. CHECKSHEET / RECORDS: QA Checksheet(s), Photos
HOLD / WITNESS: HOLD
EXTERNAL (REQUESTED BY PS4) / INTERNAL (JFC REQUIREMENT): External
PS3 OWNER: JFC
HOLD / REVIEW / WITNESS: REVIEW
PS4 OWNER SIGN OFF: T&T
14.02 - Unsuitable Foundation
DRAWING / SPECIFICATION REF.: T+T NAL Recovery Specifications: 10.2.5.1.4

SPECIFICATION DETAIL SUMMARY: If trench bottom material isn't suitable for pipe foundation, Contractor must over- excavate upon receipt of order from the Engineer, and backfill with approved material.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Over excavation required if trench invert is less than the CBR values in Table 10.1 (snippet below).
○ Replacement material tested for strength using Clegg Hammer or Scala and shall achieve equivalent CBR strength values given in Table 10.1.
Table 10.1 Trench invert strengths
Trench situation || Minimum required CBR value at trench design invert level
In non-road areas || 3.5
In permanent road areas with depth to trench invert less than 0.6 m || 5
As in 2. but with depth to trench invert greater than 0.6 m || 3.5
Beneath temporary construction haul roads || add 3 to the above permanent road case CBR's
TEST SPEC AND FREQUENCY: For pipe diameters < 1,000 mm: testing at 10 m maximum centres for each placed layer.
○ For pipe diameters 1,000 mm to 1500 mm: testing at 5 m maximum centres for each placed layer.
○ For pipe diameters CHAR(62) 1,500 mm: testing at 2.5 m centres for each placed layer.
CONTROL TYPE I.E. CHECKSHEET / RECORDS: QA Checksheet(s), Clegg and or Scala Test Results, Photos
HOLD / WITNESS: HOLD
EXTERNAL (REQUESTED BY PS4) / INTERNAL (JFC REQUIREMENT): External
PS3 OWNER: JFC
HOLD / REVIEW / WITNESS: REVIEW
PS4 OWNER SIGN OFF: T&T
